subtype.string:
Option =
{id, integer()} |
{pos, {X :: integer(), Y :: integer()}} |
{size, {W :: integer(), H :: integer()}} |
{style, integer()}

clause.head:
findText(This, MinPos, MaxPos, Text, Options :: [Option]) ->
integer()

formatRange(This,
DoDraw,
StartPos,
EndPos,
Draw,
Target,
RenderRect,
PageRect) ->
integer()

subtype.string:
RenderRect = PageRect =
{X :: integer(),
Y :: integer(),
W :: integer(),
H :: integer()}

Option =
{id, integer()} |
{pos, {X :: integer(), Y :: integer()}} |
{size, {W :: integer(), H :: integer()}} |
{style, integer()}

clause.head:
styleSetFontAttr(This,
StyleNum,
Size,
FaceName,
Bold,
Italic,
Underline) ->
ok

styleSetFontAttr(This,
StyleNum,
Size,
FaceName,
Bold,
Italic,
Underline,
Options :: [Option]) ->
ok
